description: Lists the hosts associated with your account.

nested_items.name: Hosts
nested_items.description: A list of hosts and the details for each host, such as status, endpoint, and provider type.

nested_items.name: HostArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the host.

nested_items.name: ProviderType
nested_items.description: The name of the installed provider to be associated with your connection. The host resource represents the infrastructure where your provider type is installed. The valid provider type is GitHub Enterprise Server.

nested_items.name: ProviderEndpoint
nested_items.description: The endpoint of the infrastructure where your provider type is installed.

nested_items.name: VpcConfiguration
nested_items.description: The VPC configuration provisioned for the host.

nested_items.name: VpcId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon VPC connected to the infrastructure where your provider type is installed.

nested_items.name: SubnetIds
nested_items.description: The ID of the subnet or subnets associated with the Amazon VPC connected to the infrastructure where your provider type is installed.

nested_items.name: SecurityGroupIds
nested_items.description: The ID of the security group or security groups associated with the Amazon VPC connected to the infrastructure where your provider type is installed.

nested_items.name: TlsCertificate
nested_items.description: The value of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) certificate associated with the infrastructure where your provider type is installed.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the host, such as PENDING, AVAILABLE, VPC_CONFIG_DELETING, VPC_CONFIG_INITIALIZING, and VPC_CONFIG_FAILED_INITIALIZATION.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: The status description for the host.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A token that can be used in the next ListHosts call. To view all items in the list, continue to call this operation with each subsequent token until no more nextToken values are returned.
